text: « When writing unit of measurement abbreviations, do not o place a period after the abbreviation (except “in." for inch or inches) o add an “s” to make the abbreviation plural (e.g., use 90 m for 90 meters, not 90 ms, which means 90 milliseconds) o repeat units when expressing ranges or multiple amounts (e.g., 16-30 kHz; 0.3, 1.5, and 3.0 mg/dl) Abbreviation ‘ Meaning em centimeter ft feet g gram in. inch kg kilogram L liter m meters ml mililiter mm milimeter % YC{INIU Laboratory of Microbial Genomics
